headline: 3 Big Reasons to Love HCA Healthcare (HCA)
summary: Over the last six months, HCA Healthcare shares have sunk to $342.40, producing a disappointing 15.8% loss - worse than the S&P 500’s 1.4% drop. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
